entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Type.GetInterfaceMap(Type)` is treated oddly by the trimming analyzers #108114
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [ReflectionLessBoundableConfiguration] #108111
  • "You must install .NET to run this application" #108110
  • [API Proposal]: AVX512-F/AVX512-VBMI2 Intrinsics for Compress instructions with merge-masking #108109
  • net9.0-ios regression causing `InvalidProgramException` in certain circumstances #108108
  • failure in Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations #108107
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Inconsistent validation behavior in TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime between Windows/Linux #106826
  • Port over non-redundant Span tests from corefxlab #25545
  • Safely receiving bool return value from C++ using unmanaged delegate in C# #108047
  • Support using COM Wrappers generators for UnmanagedType.IUnknown #107864
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests failing with System.TimeoutException : Timeout 30000ms exceeded. #108102
    10.0.0
  • WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations timeout #108074
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup after GC info version update. #108117
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fix typos #108116
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Delete unused RedirectFunctor abstraction #108113
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 129.0.6668.58, windows: 129.0.6668.59 #108105
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • delete deadcode from nsutilpriv.h #108104
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve local diagnostic of AOT enabled build #108059
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Fix TRACE_GC build #108089
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Issue a deprecation warning for COMPlus_ prefix #107759
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Improve Guid v7 performance on Unix #106525
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2544205 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Provide support for alternative rounding modes for division and remainder of division #106795
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move tools to use LKG ILC #107772
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • dotnet workload install maui fails because Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui.Msi.x64 version 8.0.7 doesn't exist #39530
  • Default app.manifest should include <heapType>SegmentHeap</heapType> #43611

PullRequests

Created

  • UpdateNuGetConfigPackageSourcesMappings: don't add empty mappings #43616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Change to attempt launching browser on dotnet run - Related Issue #9038 #43615
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • remove `net7.0` target #75205
  • NullRef in GenerateVariable.CSharpGenerateVariableCodeFixProvider.GetCodeActionsAsync #75204
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Field-backed properties: definite assignment #75116
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Micro Frontends with Blazor #58021
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https #58020
  • Perf improvement: caching #58019
  • Add Key Property to ServiceFilterAttribute #58017
  • Support for Demonstrating Proof of Possession (DPoP) authorization tokens #58016
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext, plaintext #58012
  • .NET9 preview's OpenAPI document generation doesn't work when transcoded from gRPC #58010

Closed

  • Minimal API Group with OpenAPI and Return Type of Result<TResult> creates incorrect OpenAPI document. #57876
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58000
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #58001
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #58002
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #58003
  • Perf improvement: https #58011
  • "You must install .NET to run this application." #58018
  • Set `launchBrowser` to `false` by default, in launchSettings.json #57507
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json #57994

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix concurrent request handling for OpenAPI documents #57972
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Unquarantine fixed tests that have not failed in 30 days #57978
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Works in debug and exception in release mode with Sql Server SMO in IOS & Android #24861
  • Mac catalyst web view is not working #24860
  • Back and forth Shell navigation end up crashing (Windows) #24858

Closed

  • List view bad scroll performance due to IconTintColorBehavior in item list template #24850
  • IconTintColorBehavior in listview item loose setting (or not updated) after item filtering #24855
  • Gestures still don't work on Label Spans #24432
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor

Updated

  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Improve MauiFactory performance by avoiding reflection to get base classes #24775
    area-core-hosting, community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar
